ability_info.name: potion
ability_info.description: Restores 200 HP of one character.
ability_info.effect: Restores 200 HP of one target. Damages zombies.

ability_info.name: hi-potion
ability_info.description: Restores 1000 HP of one character.
ability_info.effect: Restores 1000 HP of one target. Damages zombies.

ability_info.name: x-potion
ability_info.description: Fully restores HP of one character.
ability_info.effect: Fully restores HP of one target (maximum of 9,999 HP). zamages Zombies.

ability_info.name: mega-potion
ability_info.description: Restores 2000 HP of each party member.
ability_info.effect: Restores 2000 HP of target party. Damages Zombies.

ability_info.name: ether
ability_info.description: Restores 100 MP of one character.
ability_info.effect: Restores 100 MP of one target. Lowers MP of zombies.

ability_info.name: turbo ether
ability_info.description: Restores 500 MP of one character.
ability_info.effect: Restores 500 MP of one target. Lowers MP of zombies.

ability_info.name: elixir
ability_info.description: Fully restores one character's HP & MP.
ability_info.effect: Fully restores HP & MP of one target (maximum of 9,999 HP and 999 MP). Damages zombies.

ability_info.name: megalixir
ability_info.description: Fully restores HP & MP of party.
ability_info.effect: Fully restores HP & MP of target party (maximum of 9,999 HP and 999 MP). Damages zombies.

ability_info.name: phoenix down
ability_info.description: Revives one character from KO.
ability_info.effect: Revives one character from KO with half of their max HP (maximum of 9,999 HP). Damages zombies and instant KO's them, if they're not immune to life.

ability_info.name: mega phoenix
ability_info.description: Revives party from KO.
ability_info.effect: Revives party from KO and fully restores HP of revived characters (maximum of 9,999 HP). Damages zombies and instant KO's them, if they're not immune to life.

ability_info.name: antidote
ability_info.description: Cures poison.
ability_info.effect: Cures poison of one target.

ability_info.name: soft
ability_info.description: Cures petrification.
ability_info.effect: Cures petrification of one target.

ability_info.name: eye drops
ability_info.description: Cures darkness.
ability_info.effect: Cures darkness of one target.

ability_info.name: echo screen
ability_info.description: Cures silence.
ability_info.effect: Cures silence of one target.

ability_info.name: holy water
ability_info.description: Cures zombie and curse.
ability_info.effect: Cures zombie and curse of one target.

ability_info.name: remedy
ability_info.description: Cures all status abnormalities.
ability_info.effect: Cures all status ailments of one target, except breaks, curse, doom, and KO.

ability_info.name: power distiller
ability_info.description: Makes one enemy drop Power Spheres.
ability_info.effect: Makes one enemy drop Power Spheres. The amount dropped equals the amount of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

ability_info.name: mana distiller
ability_info.description: Makes one enemy drop Mana Spheres.
ability_info.effect: Makes one enemy drop Mana Spheres. The amount dropped equals the amount of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

ability_info.name: speed distiller
ability_info.description: Makes one enemy drop Speed Spheres.
ability_info.effect: Makes one enemy drop Speed Spheres. The amount dropped equals the amount of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

ability_info.name: ability distiller
ability_info.description: Makes one enemy drop Ability Spheres.
ability_info.effect: Makes one enemy drop Ability Spheres. The amount dropped equals the amount of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

ability_info.name: al bhed potion
ability_info.description: Cures poison, silence, petrification. Gives 1000 HP to all.
ability_info.effect: Cures poison, silence, and petrification and restores 1000 HP of target party.

ability_info.name: healing water
ability_info.description: Fully restores HP of party.
ability_info.effect: Fully restores HP of target party. Maximum of 9,999 HP.

ability_info.name: tetra elemental
ability_info.description: Fully restores HP and casts NulAll on party.
ability_info.effect: Fully restores HP (maximum of 9,999 HP) and casts NulAll on one target.

ability_info.name: antarctic wind
ability_info.description: Deals ice damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 600 HP of ice-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: arctic wind
ability_info.description: Deals ice damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 1,000 HP of ice-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: ice gem
ability_info.description: Deals ice damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals five randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 600 HP of ice-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.name: bomb fragment
ability_info.description: Deals fire damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 600 HP of fire-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: bomb core
ability_info.description: Deals fire damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 1,000 HP of fire-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: fire gem
ability_info.description: Deals fire damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals five randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 600 HP of fire-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.name: electro marble
ability_info.description: Deals lightning damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 600 HP of lightning-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: lightning marble
ability_info.description: Deals lightning damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 1,000 HP of lightning-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: lightning gem
ability_info.description: Deals lightning damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals five randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 600 HP of lightning-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.name: fish scale
ability_info.description: Deals water damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 600 HP of water-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: dragon scale
ability_info.description: Deals water damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 1,000 HP of water-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: water gem
ability_info.description: Deals water damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals five randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 600 HP of water-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.name: grenade
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 350 HP of non-elemental special damage to target party (can critical).

ability_info.name: frag grenade
ability_info.description: Inflicts damage and Armor Break on all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Armor Break on target party and deals around 800 HP of non-elemental special damage (can critical).

ability_info.name: sleeping powder
ability_info.description: Inflicts damage and sleep on all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Sleep and deals around 750 HP of non-elemental special damage to target party.

ability_info.name: dream powder
ability_info.description: Inflicts damage and sleep on all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Sleep and deals around 1000 HP of non-elemental special damage to target party.

ability_info.name: silence grenade
ability_info.description: Inflicts damage and silence on all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Silence and deals around 750 HP of non-elemental special damage to target party.

ability_info.name: smoke bomb
ability_info.description: Inflicts damage and darkness on all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Darkness and deals around 750 HP of non-elemental special damage to target party.

ability_info.name: shadow gem
ability_info.description: Reduces HP of all enemies by half.
ability_info.effect: Deals gravity-based special damage to target party equal to half their current HP (maximum of 9,999 HP).

ability_info.name: shining gem
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 6,000 HP of non-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: blessed gem
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 8,000 HP of holy-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: supreme gem
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 10,000 HP of non-elemental special damage to one target (maximum of 9,999 HP).

ability_info.name: poison fang
ability_info.description: Inflicts damage and poison on an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Poison and deals around 2000 HP of non-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: silver hourglass
ability_info.description: Delays next turn of all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Slow on target party.

ability_info.name: gold hourglass
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies and delays their next turn.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Slow and weak Delay, and deals around 1000 HP of non-elemental special damage to target party.

ability_info.name: candle of life
ability_info.description: Casts Doom on an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Doom on one target.

ability_info.name: petrify grenade
ability_info.description: Petrifies all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Petrification on all enemies.

ability_info.name: farplane shadow
ability_info.description: Inflicts death on an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Death on one target.

ability_info.name: farplane wind
ability_info.description: Inflicts death on all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Death on all enemies.

ability_info.name: dark matter
ability_info.description: Deals major damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 12,750 HP of non-elemental special damage to target party. Can break the damage limit without the auto-ability equipped.

ability_info.name: chocobo feather
ability_info.description: Casts Haste on one character.
ability_info.effect: Casts Haste on one target.

ability_info.name: chocobo wing
ability_info.description: Casts Haste on party.
ability_info.effect: Casts Haste on target party.

ability_info.name: lunar curtain
ability_info.description: Casts Shell on one character.
ability_info.effect: Casts Shell on one target.

ability_info.name: light curtain
ability_info.description: Casts Protect on one character.
ability_info.effect: Casts Protect on one target.

ability_info.name: star curtain
ability_info.description: Casts Reflect on one character.
ability_info.effect: Casts Reflect on one target.

ability_info.name: healing spring
ability_info.description: Casts Regen on one character.
ability_info.effect: Casts Regen on one target.

ability_info.name: mana spring
ability_info.description: Absorbs MP from an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Absorbs around 1000 MP from one target.

ability_info.name: stamina spring
ability_info.description: Absorbs HP from an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Absorbs around 400 HP from one target.

ability_info.name: soul spring
ability_info.description: Absorbs HP & MP from an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Absorbs around 1500 HP and MP from one target.

ability_info.name: purifying salt
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy and dispels its magic effects.
ability_info.effect: Casts Dispel and deals around 1,100 HP of non-elemental special damage to one target.

ability_info.name: stamina tablet
ability_info.description: Doubles max HP of one character.
ability_info.effect: Doubles max HP of one character (maximum of 9,999 HP without 'Break HP Limit'). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: mana tablet
ability_info.description: Doubles max MP of one character.
ability_info.effect: Doubles max MP of one character (maximum of 999 MP without 'Break MP Limit'). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: stamina tonic
ability_info.description: Doubles max HP of party.
ability_info.effect: Doubles max HP of party (maximum of 9,999 HP without 'Break HP Limit'). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: mana tonic
ability_info.description: Doubles max MP of party.
ability_info.effect: Doubles max MP of party (maximum of 999 MP without 'Break MP Limit'). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: twin stars
ability_info.description: Reduces MP cost of one character to 0.
ability_info.effect: Reduces MP cost of one character to 0. Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: three stars
ability_info.description: Reduces party's MP cost to 0.
ability_info.effect: Reduces MP cost of party to 0. Effect goes away when KO'd.
